title: FT: SGC 40s... my Sov, OM and PB for your SC and Pied
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FT: SGC 40s... my Sov, OM and PB for your SC and Pied
posts.post_content:
I've decided to only have Piedmont and Sweet Caporals in my SGC 40 set.  It's comprised mostly of those two backs now anyway, but I do have a few Sovereign, Old Mill and Polar Bear.

Looking to get back the same player/pose/grade in a Pied or SC, plus a little extra for the "back downgrade" assuming that the eye appeal is comparable.  If you have something you'd like to propose, send me a PM.  Each link below is of the front scan of the card in my registry.

Sovereign 350 Apple Green
[URL="http://sgccardregistry.com/cards/us226651.jpg"]Johnny Evers (With Bat, Chicago On Shirt)[/URL]

Old Mill
[URL="http://sgccardregistry.com/cards/us219091.jpg"]Harry Bay[/URL]
[URL="http://sgccardregistry.com/cards/us231486.jpg"]Hal Chase (Portrait, Blue Background)[/URL]
[URL="http://sgccardregistry.com/cards/us240813.jpg"]Bill Cranston[/URL]
[URL="http://sgccardregistry.com/cards/us190105.jpg"]Molly Miller[/URL]
[URL="http://sgccardregistry.com/cards/us209619.jpg"]Al Orth[/URL]
[URL="http://sgccardregistry.com/cards/us219092.jpg"]Ed Reagan[/URL]
[URL="http://sgccardregistry.com/cards/us203916.jpg"]Dutch Revelle[/URL]

Polar Bear
[URL="http://sgccardregistry.com/cards/us231586.jpg"]Harry McIntyre (Brooklyn & Chicago)[/URL]
[URL="http://sgccardregistry.com/cards/us209618.jpg"]Charley O'Leary (Hands On Knees)[/URL]
[URL="http://sgccardregistry.com/cards/us209620.jpg"]Jake Pfeister (Throwing)[/URL] 
[URL="http://sgccardregistry.com/cards/us204551.jpg"]Ed Reulbach (No Glove Showing)[/URL]
[URL="http://sgccardregistry.com/cards/us231588.jpg"]Jake Stahl (Glove Shows)[/URL]
[URL="http://sgccardregistry.com/cards/us209613.jpg"]Harry Steinfeldt (With Bat)[/URL]

Hi Er!ck

PM on the way


Jantz
